subheading: Smilo Foundation Wallet is a free, client-side interface helping you interact with the Smilo blockchain. Our easy-to-use, open-source platform allows you to generate wallets, interact with smart contracts, and so much more.
obtainAddress: Obtain a XSM address and generate your private key. Saving and safekeeping the key will be your responsibility.
accessMyWalletDesc: Send or swap your XSM and tokens, interact with smart contracts, and more! This is where the magic happens.
aboutSubheading: Smilo Foundation Wallet puts the Smilo blockchain at your fingertips. Originally developed by the excellent MEW team: a team of crypto-enthusiasts dedicated to bring you the most secure, most intuitive, and dare we say prettiest way to manage your crypto tokens. We're always here to help, and we're never giving away XSM. Cheers!
aboutMewWalletDesc: Access the Smilo blockchain's original and most-trusted wallet client, now with a host of new features all contained in an elegant, easy-to-use interface.
aboutHardwareWalletDesc: Smilo Foundation Wallet offers support for all major hardware wallets including Ledger, Trezor, and many more.
aboutSwapDesc: MEW has partnered with Bity, Kyber Network, Changelly, and Simplex to allow users to swap fiat to crypto, XSM and BTC, XSM and ERC-20.
aboutMewConnectDesc: Smilo Foundation Wallet's companion app brings hardware-wallet style security to your iOS or Android smartphone, helping you to secure your funds as never before.
faqsSubheading: Have not found the question that you are looking for?
socialSubheading: Get in the know and see your balance grow (we hope)!
howToCreateWalletTitle: How do I create a new wallet?
howToCreateWalletDesc: Smilo Foundation Wallet offers three ways to create a new XSM wallet. These are via SMILOconnect, Keystore file, or Mnemonic phrase.
whatIsMewConnectDesc: SMILOconnect is our companion mobile app for Smilo Foundation Wallet. We call it a hardware wallet without all the hardware. Now available for all Android and iOS smartphones!
workingWOtherWalletsTitle: Can Smilo Foundation Wallet work with other wallets?
workingWOtherWalletsDesc: Smilo Foundation Wallet supports many different wallet types including hardware wallets, such as the Ledger Nano S or Trezor, and wallets like Smilo Foundation Wallet-extension. We are also open for anyone to use their Smilo wallets with the appropriate information.
howToSendTxTitle: How can I send a transaction?
howToSendTxDesc: Smilo Foundation Wallet lets anyone with a balance of XSM send a transaction, without additional charges.
forgotPasswordPrivKeyTitle: I forgot my password/private key! What can I do?
forgotPasswordPrivKeyDesc: Smilo Foundation Wallet does not offer support to recover or reset passwords/private keys. We always suggest writing down private keys and passwords on physical paper/notebooks for safekeeping. Maybe you saved it on your computer! For ideas on what to look for, read more
welcomeTov5: Welcome to Smilo Foundation Wallet V5
welcomeToV5Desc1: Welcome to the brand new Smilo Foundation Wallet! If this is your first time visiting, check out our {0}.
welcomeToV5Desc2: Vintage Smilo Foundation Wallet can still be accessed {0}, or at the bottom of the page.
